- Mount complete filesystem structure matching Replicant implementation
- Fix package naming: @refinio/one.ifsprojfs â†’ @refinio/one.projfs for consistency
- Integration tests pass: ProjFS mount works, invites readable at /invites/iop_invite.txt
- Bidirectional contact creation verified
EOF
)")
